DOC.brief_summary: The goal study determine whether 6 week intervention effective prevent worsen depressive symptom development clinical depression low-income African American pregnant recently deliver woman enrol home visiting program .
DOC.brief_title: Preventing Postpartum Depression African American Home Visiting Clients
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct randomize control trial ( RCT ) woman four Baltimore City home visit program . We screen 200 woman pregnant child < 6 month study inclusion ; 91 woman elevate risk develop postpartum depression ( PPD ) randomize intervention ( MB Course ) usual home visit control group . Women intervention group receive 6-week MB Course deliver group set Study Clinician reinforce message provide home visitor 1-on-1 home visit , woman attention control receive usual home visiting service information postpartum depression . Primary outcome include depressive symptom depressive episode .
DOC.criteria: pregnant child < 6 month age enrol home visit program exhibiting elevate depressive symptom and/or personal history clinical depression current clinical depression time enrollment
DOC.keyword: depression , African American , home visiting , prevention
